messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/1/2002 8:31:33 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Dar, Contact me offlist with detailed requirements AFTER the conference (October11-13). I m
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/1/2002 8:31:33 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> We have a whole farm for the dog to run on, 2 cats he'll need to live
> with (but they're experienced dog-cats, they don't run), and optional
> bedspace. We need a dog who bonds well to people and is loyal, who
> doesn't yap, who rides well in the car, and who gets along with other
> dogs.
>
> I imagine we'll get a shelter dog of some sort, we always do, so it may
> very well be a mixed breed...
>
> Any ideas?
>

Dar, Contact me offlist with detailed requirements AFTER the conference
(October11-13). I'm a bit overwhelmed right now, but I can put you in touch
with the rescue folks for every breed of dog in a coupla' weeks. Greyhounds
are lovely and in desperate need of homes. But they might not suit you all
personality-wise (esp with cats).

Kelly
kbcdlovejo@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
